cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV. 

The paper proposes a new method for policy improvement in reinforcement learning, which is a subfield of machine learning. The paper focuses on continuous control tasks, which are typically studied in robotics and control theory, suggesting that the paper may belong to the sub-categories of machine learning that are relevant to these fields. The paper also mentions that it compares its method to state-of-the-art algorithms, suggesting that it may belong to the sub-category of machine learning that focuses on algorithm development and evaluation. Based on these observations, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.RO (Robotics), cs.SY (Systems and Control), and cs.CV (Computer Vision).
